document_data.name: The Steel Serpent
document_data.mainbody: '''The Steel Serpent''' was an average inn found in the city of [[Dihliz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Certainly not the first choice for anyone with financial means, the Steel Serpent was a low-budget option where adventurers stayed while passing through Dihliz. Occupants shared a common sleeping area, making theft of personal belongings a common occurrence.
document_data.Inhabitants: The inn was owned and operated by a retired treasure-hunter named [[Tahani]].
